About Me

Hello! My name is Prakash and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My interest in web development started back in 2019 when I decided to try editing custom Tumblr themes — turns out hacking together a custom reblog button taught me a lot about HTML & CSS!

Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with recently:
